abilities.name: Shell Slam
abilities.description: Slams its massive shell into the target.

abilities.name: Defensive Curl
abilities.description: Withdraws into its shell to increase defense.

abilities.name: Heavy Crush
abilities.description: Body slams the opponent with its weight.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Restores its health over time.

abilities.name: Root Smash
abilities.description: Roots rise from the ground and crush foes.

abilities.name: Bark Skin
abilities.description: Thickens its bark, increasing defense.

abilities.name: Vine Grab
abilities.description: Entangles foes, reducing their speed.

abilities.name: Nature's Recovery
abilities.description: Absorbs vitality from the earth to heal itself.

abilities.name: Boulder Toss
abilities.description: Hurls a massive stone at enemies.

abilities.name: Stone Skin
abilities.description: Hardens its body to resist damage.

abilities.name: Earthquake Stomp
abilities.description: Creates tremors that damage all enemies.

abilities.name: Rocky Regeneration
abilities.description: Reforms body from surrounding stone.

abilities.name: Toxic Belch
abilities.description: Spews poisonous bile that weakens foes.

abilities.name: Tongue Lash
abilities.description: Whips enemies with its long tongue.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: Releases toxic mist reducing enemy defense.

abilities.name: Regenerative Slime
abilities.description: Heals itself by secreting mucus.

abilities.name: Carapace Charge
abilities.description: Charges forward with its hard shell, knocking foes back.

abilities.name: Reflective Shell
abilities.description: Reflects part of the damage taken back.

abilities.name: Horn Strike
abilities.description: Pierces enemies with its horn.

abilities.name: Diamond Skin
abilities.description: Temporarily nearly impervious to damage.

abilities.name: Savage Strike
abilities.description: A brutal melee attack that ignores some defense.

abilities.name: Battle Fury
abilities.description: Increases attack power but reduces defense.

abilities.name: Intimidating Roar
abilities.description: Weakens enemies with a terrifying howl.

abilities.name: Bloodthirst
abilities.description: Heals by dealing damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Bone Club
abilities.description: Swings a massive bone with devastating force.

abilities.name: Berserker Rage
abilities.description: Enters a rage, massively boosting strength.

abilities.name: Crushing Blow
abilities.description: A devastating attack that cripples enemies.

abilities.name: Troll Regeneration
abilities.description: Rapidly heals wounds in battle.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Leaps at enemies with claws extended.

abilities.name: Predator's Focus
abilities.description: Focuses hunting instincts to boost all combat abilities.

abilities.name: Rending Claws
abilities.description: Tears through enemy defenses.

abilities.name: Alpha Roar
abilities.description: Rallies strength while intimidating foes.

abilities.name: Gore Charge
abilities.description: Charges with horns lowered for massive damage.

abilities.name: War Cry
abilities.description: Boosts own strength while demoralizing enemies.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Goes berserk, dealing area damage.

abilities.name: Minotaur's Might
abilities.description: Channels ancient strength.

abilities.name: Fire Bite
abilities.description: Bites with flaming fangs.

abilities.name: Infernal Strength
abilities.description: Burns with inner fire, boosting power.

abilities.name: Hellfire Breath
abilities.description: Breathes scorching flames at enemies.

abilities.name: Phoenix Revival
abilities.description: Resurrects with burning vigor.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Strikes from the shadows with incredible speed.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description: Moves so fast it becomes hard to target.

abilities.name: Phantom Dash
abilities.description: Phases through enemies while attacking.

abilities.name: Predator's Grace
abilities.description: Natural agility enhances all movements.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb
abilities.description: Dives from above at tremendous speed.

abilities.name: Wind Dance
abilities.description: Rides air currents to boost speed and evasion.

abilities.name: Talon Strike
abilities.description: Rakes enemies with razor-sharp talons.

abilities.name: Storm Call
abilities.description: Summons wind to aid in battle.

abilities.name: Web Shot
abilities.description: Fires webbing to slow and damage enemies.

abilities.name: Phase Step
abilities.description: Briefly phases out of reality to avoid attacks.

abilities.name: Venomous Bite
abilities.description: Bites with deadly poison that spreads quickly.

abilities.name: Dimensional Web
abilities.description: Creates reality-bending webs that enhance mobility.

abilities.name: Scythe Slash
abilities.description: Slashes with blade-like arms.

abilities.name: Praying Stance
abilities.description: Assumes a meditative pose that enhances reflexes.

abilities.name: Flurry of Blades
abilities.description: Unleashes a barrage of cutting attacks.

abilities.name: Zen Focus
abilities.description: Achieves perfect balance between mind and body.

abilities.name: Lightning Nip
abilities.description: Quick bite charged with electrical energy.

abilities.name: Pack Leader's Sprint
abilities.description: Rallies speed through pack mentality.

abilities.name: Storm Howl
abilities.description: Howls to summon electrical storms.

abilities.name: Alpha's Swiftness
abilities.description: Channels the speed of the storm itself.

abilities.name: Stone Fist
abilities.description: Punches with rock-hard fists.

abilities.name: Fortress Stance
abilities.description: Adopts an immovable defensive position.

abilities.name: Crushing Guard
abilities.description: Counterattacks while defending.

abilities.name: Stone Renewal
abilities.description: Repairs damage using surrounding stone.

abilities.name: Crystal Spear
abilities.description: Fires sharp crystal projectiles.

abilities.name: Prism Shield
abilities.description: Creates a shimmering barrier that deflects attacks.

abilities.name: Refraction Burst
abilities.description: Explodes in a shower of razor crystals.

abilities.name: Crystalline Regeneration
abilities.description: Regrows damaged crystal armor.

abilities.name: Iron Slam
abilities.description: Strikes with mechanical precision and force.

abilities.name: Defensive Protocols
abilities.description: Activates advanced shielding systems.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.description: Boosts all systems at the cost of defense.

abilities.name: Self-Repair
abilities.description: Initiates automatic repair protocols.

abilities.name: Molten Strike
abilities.description: Attacks with superheated stone fists.

abilities.name: Volcanic Armor
abilities.description: Hardens into nearly impenetrable volcanic glass.

abilities.name: Lava Burst
abilities.description: Erupts with molten rock, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Magma Regeneration
abilities.description: Draws power from the earth's core to heal.

abilities.name: Branch Whip
abilities.description: Lashes out with flexible wooden limbs.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Grows thick bark to absorb damage.

abilities.name: Root Network
abilities.description: Connects to other plants for support.

abilities.name: Forest's Blessing
abilities.description: Channels the power of ancient woods.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: Fires pure magical energy at enemies.

abilities.name: Mana Burn
abilities.description: Drains enemy mana while boosting own magical power.

abilities.name: Phase Form
abilities.description: Becomes ethereal, avoiding physical attacks.

abilities.name: Void Absorption
abilities.description: Absorbs magical energy from the environment.

abilities.name: Fire Blast
abilities.description: Unleashes scorching flames.

abilities.name: Flame Aura
abilities.description: Surrounds self with protective fire.

abilities.name: Inferno
abilities.description: Creates a devastating fire storm.

abilities.name: Phoenix Rebirth
abilities.description: Resurrects from flames with renewed power.

abilities.name: Ice Shard
abilities.description: Hurls razor-sharp ice projectiles.

abilities.name: Frozen Armor
abilities.description: Encases self in protective ice.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Summons a freezing storm that slows all enemies.

abilities.name: Glacial Renewal
abilities.description: Draws power from eternal winter.

abilities.name: Shadow Touch
abilities.description: Drains life force with a ghostly touch.

abilities.name: Nightmare Aura
abilities.description: Spreads fear that weakens enemy resolve.

abilities.name: Soul Rend
abilities.description: Tears at the enemy's very essence.

abilities.name: Spectral Regeneration
abilities.description: Feeds on fear and despair to restore itself.

abilities.name: Divine Strike
abilities.description: Attacks with holy energy.

abilities.name: Sanctuary
abilities.description: Creates a protective barrier of light.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.description: Calls down divine punishment on enemies.

abilities.name: Heavenly Grace
abilities.description: Channels celestial power for healing and strength.
